Package juno.model.util

Interface Observable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfigurationFilesFactory, AbstractCounter, AbstractHumanPlayer, AbstractObservable, AbstractPlayer, ActualColorManager, AgeSetter, AI, AiFactory, AvatarImage, AvatarImageSetter, AvatarNameSetter, CardController, CardDispenser, CardEffectController, CardTimer, CircleConnector, ConfigurationFilesFactory, Connector, Deck, DeckFactory, DeckFiller, DiscardedCardSetter, DiscardedPile, DrawAction, FullScreenSetter, GameInitializer, GameStarter, GamesWonCounter, GProfileFactory, GSetterAction, HumanPlayer, Inverter, LastNameSetter, LostGamesCounter, Mixer, Mover, NameSetter, Objective, OneCardController, OneCardDispenser, PassTurnAction, PenaltyExecutor, PenaltyTimer, PlayersProvider, ProfileNameSetter, ProfilesRefresher, RegistrationDataSelector, StopAction, Stopper, TurnJumper, TurnMover, WinConditionController, WinnerManager
public interface Observable
This interface defines observable object in the Observable / Observer design patter.
Author:
Simone Gentili
